<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Belial (The Pale Kiss)](/Deities.aspx?ID=396)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 300

The lord of [Hell’s](/Planes.aspx?ID=42) fourth layer, Phlegethon, is Belial. The Pale Kiss was created by [Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=278) as an object of adoration, with perfect form and beauty in the eyes of every creature. As a result, Belial has a virtually unlimited malleability of form, shifting between shapes almost constantly. His appearance is often as dualistic as his personality: half his body beautiful and half grotesque, much as he revels equally in pleasure and pain. As he is a creature of carnal desires, so are his followers: those who crave forbidden pleasures of the flesh but hide behind masks of respectability.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Archdevils](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=4)

**Edicts** Indulge your basest desires, create deadly weapons

**Anathema** Impede an act of high hedonism, become too attached to a lover or project

**Area of Concern**
Adultery, deception, desire
